title: Life expectancy in Mexico 2017
yAxis: Life expectancy at birth in years
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Life expectancy at birth in years, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2007.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2015.
gold: The statistic shows the life expectancy at birth in Mexico from 2007 to 2017 . In 2017 , the average life expectancy at birth in Mexico was about 74.95 years .
